name: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Boil spaghetti. Fry pancetta. Mix eggs and cheese. Combine all.

name: Tomato Soup
instructions: Cook all ingredients. Blend until smooth. Serve hot.

name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
instructions: Butter bread. Place cheese between slices. Grill until golden brown.

name: Chicken Curry
instructions: Cook chicken. Add onions and curry powder. Add coconut milk. Simmer.

name: Caesar Salad
instructions: Chop lettuce. Toss with dressing, cheese, and croutons.

name: Beef Tacos
instructions: Cook beef. Fill taco shells with beef and toppings.

name: Pancakes
instructions: Mix ingredients. Cook on griddle until golden brown.

name: Chocolate Cake
instructions: Mix ingredients. Bake at 350°F for 30 minutes.

name: Lasagna
instructions: Layer noodles, meat, and cheeses. Bake at 375°F for 45 minutes.
